agent_utterance: Today's ultra-simple plan (about 3.9/5 effort): 1) drink one 250 ml glass of water and wait 2 minutes; 2) take 4 slow breaths to reset; 3) rate your hunger on a 0–5 scale; 4) if hunger is 2 or higher, have a small, hydrating snack (piece of fruit, yogurt, or a few almonds); 5) set a reminder to sip water again in 30 minutes. If you’re not hungry, still sip water and do a quick check-in in 30 minutes.
